titleStmt.title: The spoyle of Antwerpe. Faithfully reported, by a true Englishman, who was present at the same. Nouem. 1576. Seene and allowed
titleStmt.author: Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.

notesStmt.note: "A true Englishman, who was present at the same" = George Gascoigne.
Actual printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.

Cropped at head, affecting running titles. Contains an extra bifolium, *Â² , with errata and preface, and at the end giving corrections for a 'Modell', presumably a folding woodcut, not present in Bodleian Library and British Library copies.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
